Package persistence

Class RepositorioCompetenciaTecnica

java.lang.Object
persistence.RepositorioCompetenciaTecnica
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RepositorioCompetenciaTecnica
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about technical competence.
See Also:
